title: Farewell, My Lovely [1975] Robert Mitchum, Sylvester Stallone, Charlotte Rampling, John Ireland

sources.title: Farewell, My Lovely [1975] Robert Mitchum, Sylvester Stallone, Charlotte Rampling, John Ireland
sources.description: You can find out more about this movie from Wikipedia. Â  Farewell, My Lovely is a 1975 American neo-nolr crime thriller film directed by Dick Richards and featuring Robert Mitchum as private detective Phillip Marlowe. The picture is based on Raymond Chandler's novel Farewell, My Lovely (1940), which had previously been adapted for film as Murder, My Sweet in 1944. The film also stars Charlotte Rampling, John Ireland, Jack O'Halloran, Sylvia Miles and Harry Dean Stanton, with an early screen appearance by Sylvester Stallone.
